mapper.sql: aip.package_id, aip.app_id, aip.file_name, aip.file_type, aip.deploy_path, aip.nexus_repository, aip.nexus_directory, aip.nexus_asset_id, aip.create_time, aip.md5
mapper.insert: insert into app_install_package(app_id, file_name, file_type, deploy_path, nexus_repository, nexus_directory, nexus_asset_id, create_time, md5) values (#{appId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fileName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fileType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{deployPath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{nexusRepository,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{nexusDirectory,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{nexusAssetId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{md5,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update app_install_package set file_type = #{fileType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, deploy_path = #{deployPath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, nexus_repository = #{nexusRepository,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, nexus_directory = #{nexusDirectory,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, nexus_asset_id = #{nexusAssetId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, md5 = #{md5,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where package_id = #{packageId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
